short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for phone identity verification. Generates unique code from email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension generates a unique verification code from a known email address and allows for verification over a phone call. To use it, simply right-click on the email, select 'Send Verification Email', and an email compose window will open with the selected email address as the recipient and 'Your One-Time Verification Code' as the subject. The body of the email contains three two-digit numbers separated by a space, which can be shared over the phone.
